channel.title: Visit Codexonline, Very good community & <- Staff positions open
channel.description:
Hi everyone. Just thought i might post my website. We need some website development crew and some forum service's workers. [b] I do have permission by 1 admin and 2 mods to post this [/b]
This website is a bout Gaming, Coding, Music, website development, Private Servers and more.
It is becoming bigger and better each day with weekly news letters, More Themes, modifications and more!
We currently have a few staff positions for the mean time. ~ Forum Services~ open open
~website development~ open open open
Please leave feed back on the site as i will take some of it onboard. Thanks.
Ikick www.codexonline.info/smf
